name: Among Us VR
abstract: Among Us VR is a party game of teamwork and betrayal.

detail.app_developer: Schell Games, Innersloth LLC, and Robot Teddy
detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
WARDROBE UPDATE
We’ve upgraded Crewmate closets, making it easier to customize and put together your perfect beansona!
- New layout to more easily equip cosmetics
- More cosmetics (and colors) visible on one page within the Wardrobe
- New bean animations to showcase cosmetics before final selection
- Added the ability to spin the Crewmate in the Wardrobe, to be able to view cosmetics from different angles
- Purchase hats during a live game (while in lobby mode) and then wear it immediately!

ADDITIONAL UPDATES
It can’t be completely unexpected that we have made adjustments to some behind-the-scenes code. We won’t bore you with the specifics tho!
- Server-side LTE Support
- URP upgrades to graphics pipeline
- Future LTE mysteries

BUG FIXES
- Improved kill button detection to act more consistently when targeting players and avoiding accidental kills as often
- Adjusted Retina Scan task to avoid inconsistent times for task completion
- Fixed an issue where some tasks might trigger in the
